title: Trolls for days
body:
Holy
Freakin
CRAP

Troll after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll  after troll. 
Constantly.
Or, if its not that, it's afks. 
I worked out roughly 20 afks in 3 days. 
20 afks.
in 3 days.

Like, why is this okay? Why do these people not get punished?
HOW TF IS IT OKAY TO RUIN A GAME FOR LULZ?
But when I say I wanna do it, it gets downvoted? (I bet its the same people who troll my games)

replies.body: Didnt you go 0/9 on Diana jungle

> [{quoted}](name=C9 Snocky,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=AHVskJQ2,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2020-02-04T10:05:08.162+0000)
>
> Didnt you go 0/9 on Diana jungle

Didn't you go 2 / 11 as Aphelios ??     Everyone has bad games.  No point cherry picking

I was kicked from my lane for lolz, and given 0, nil, nada, nothinc, zero, none assistence when ganking.

But ignore that.
You do you.

> I was kicked from my lane for lolz, and given 0, nil, nada, nothinc, zero, none assistence when ganking.
> 
> But ignore that.
> You do you.

Personally, i think you are just a bad player. But of course you think too highly of yourself to ever cross that bridge.

People don't ban for AFK/Quitting

Riot only care if you upset another player with naughty words (and even then, they're rather lenient).
Lord how I know, I get the same AFKs time and time again.
They dont care about players who try to play the game the only solution is to quit this game and find another game where company care about players
Can't beat them then join them ;)
Wanted to, apparently the idea I had got downvoted to hell by the same trolls who didn't like a taste of their own medicine.
